html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2004-12772004-10-28,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisReappointment of BARBARA J. CRAM of Regina, Saskatchewan, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; designation of BARBARA J. CRAM for the Manitoba/Saskatchewan region, as established under subsection 10(1.1) of that Act; and determine that BARBARA J. CRAM shall reside within 100 kilometres of the Manitoba/Saskatchewan regional office; effective November 1, 2004.
AttachmentsAttachment

CRAM shall reside within 100 kilometres of the Manitoba/Saskatchewan regional office; effective November 1, 2004.
